name: .H5E
summary: Learn about .H5E files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an H5E file with POD HD500 Edit. To do so, select File â†’ Open... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your H5E file.
You can also open an H5E file with POD HD500X Edit. To do so, either drag and drop the file into the program, or rename the file to use the .5xe extension before opening it.
